headline.main: AP-NORC Poll: Divided Americans Fret Country Losing Identity
headline.print_headline: AP-NORC Poll: Divided Americans Fret Country Losing Identity

lead_paragraph: Add one more to the list of things dividing left and right in this country: We can't even agree what it means to be an American.
snippet: Add one more to the list of things dividing left and right in this country: We can't even agree what it means to be an American....
